subject: p12702423
Findings: Again seen is a left PICC in the upper to mid SVC. Innumerable metastatic pulmonary nodules are present. There are continued multifocal hazy opacities, with confluent consolidation in the left lower lobe. Right upper lobe collapse is unchanged. Moderate left and small right pleural effusions, moderate cardiomegaly, and central venous congestion persist. No pneumothorax.
Impression: Stable appearance of pulmonary metastases, multifocal pneumonia, pulmonary edema, and right upper lobe collapse.
